column4: Wonder if anyone can help/advise.  Have a dual boot Vista and Jaunty, every now and then after running vista the grub boot fails, can fix with live disk and get going again but it keeps happening, any clues

Wonder if anyone can help/advise.  Have a dual boot Vista and Jaunty, every now and then after running vista the grub boot fails, can fix with live disk and get going again but it keeps happening, any clues
What is the error that you get?
when in the boot process does it reboot? When GRUB tries to start loading the OS? Before the GRUB menu appears?
